column2:
"The rainbow-colored mist at the Dragon Altar...
The dragon soul mist..."

"Eyewitnesses have
said that it looks like
a collection of Dragonkin souls..."

"It's nearer to a supernatural
phenomenon than just a climate disturbance..."

"...r-right?
If possible, I want you to observe and
collect data on that phenomenon."

"I'm sorry for always doing this.
As always, I'm counting on you!"
